fields.description:
Navigating to Miscellaneous, Orientation and then pressing any orientation button doesn't cause any orientation changes

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Launch KS
2. Navigate to Miscellaneous
3. Press Orientation table view row
4. Press Set Landscape button

Actual Result:
Orientation doesn't change

Expected result:
Orientation should change to landscape
fields.summary: Android: Orientation - v8 only, Nook only, setting orientation does not work
fields.environment:
Ti Studio 1.0.7.201111071800
Ti Mobile SDK 1.8.0.8911fc4
Nook Color Android OS 2.2
OSX Lion 10.7.2
